ai-patthana20.4:0.2_0: the immediately Factors of the Dhamma
ai-patthana20.4:1.1_0: Or consciousness doesn’t give rise to perception ...
ai-patthana20.4:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for secret hate ...
ai-patthana20.4:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the bad,
ai-patthana20.4:5.1_0: A hindrances ... a teaching ... a basis for happiness.
